short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to change the osticket theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beta theme applicator for the frontend of osticket instances. Can be used for both the customer and staff interface. Currently the tool is built to run on specific sites running osticket, however the ability to distinguish between pages is in the development plan. Source code is available at the support link if you are interested in developing your own skins or extensions.
